name: Openwave Computing
tagline: Enhance Your Business With Our Impeccable Solution
description:
Openwave Computing is a leading IT services corporation that has been delivering cutting-edge technology solutions to a global clientele since 1997. In addition to redefining the web and mobile app space through our innovative solutions, we’ve also aided in business development, having empowered several clients with our customized solutions.
Be it a Fortune 500 company or a small startup, our solutions have reached everyone and have won accolades owing to our outstanding service delivery model. 
With a strict emphasis on quality and compliance with international security standards, our ISO-certified organization provides a range of services such as Website Design and Development, Web Application Development, PHP Development, .Net Development, Mobile Application Development, Blockchain, Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, Payment Gateway Solutions, Ecommerce & CMS Solutions, Digital Marketing/SEO.
 
READ MORE...

locations.address: Suite 3B-6-3A, Plaza Sentral, Jalan Stesen Sentral 5
